select ifnull(count(*),0) from board
user_name like concat('%',#{ name },'%')
b_subject like concat('%',#{ subject },'%')
or b_content like concat('%',#{ content },'%')

insert into board( b_idx , b_subject , b_content , b_ip , b_regdate , b_ref , b_step , b_depth , b_use , user_idx , user_name ) values(#{ b_idx }, #{ b_subject }, #{ b_content }, #{ b_ip }, now(), #{ b_ref }, 0, 0, 'y', #{user_idx}, #{user_name} )
mapper.update: update board set b_readhit = b_readhit+1 where b_idx = #{b_idx}
update board set b_step = b_step +1 where b_ref=#{ b_ref } and b_step > #{ b_step }
mapper.select: insert into board values(#{ b_idx }, #{ b_subject }, #{ b_content }, #{ b_ip }, now(), 0, #{ user_idx }, #{ user_name }, #{ b_ref }, #{ b_step }, #{ b_depth }, 'y')
